Madam Cyn's Home Movies (2006) [WS.PDTV(Xvid)]
Sex in the 80s: Madam Cyn's Home Movies.
Did Cynthia Payne's suburban sexual revolution really change Britain for the better?

FileSize....502 MB (526,667,776 bytes)

Quality.....0.200 Bits/(PixelxFrame)
FrameRate...25Hz
Audio.......132KB/s MP3 VBR
Duration....48 minutes
AirDate.....31-Mar-08 0:30-1:30 Channel4

Cynthia Payne began the 80s in jail as a notorious brothel keeper. By 1987 a London court acquitted her of the same crime and the public gallery cheered. The exposure of Payne's infamous sex parties, held behind the net curtains of her home in Streatham, South London, made her almost a national treasure.

With access to Payne's home movies for the first time and featuring interviews with Payne and some of her former clients and employees, the programme Madam Cyn's Home Movies looked at the woman who straddled the sexual sea change of the 1980s with a smile, a cup of tea and a fistful of luncheon vouchers.
